title: Are all of us really judgemental, aren’t there anyone who isn't? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yeah. The non-judgmental ones just hide their judgmentalism intensely, and they have out of control judgmentalism. Because they kept it hidden, even from themselves, it runs rampant in the dark. Anyone who claims they don’t judge is scary to me. They are probably a retard who doesn’t understand the meaning of that word and has absolutely no self-knowledge.
